text: Yordan Ivanov (born 22 March 1932) is a Bulgarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Bulgaria Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Plovdiv Province
title: Yordan Ivanov (equestrian)
